description: striding demon-man, with closed umbrella in proper right hand, rests proper left hand on shoulder of Okame, who adjusts the demon's sandal with his proper left hand and rests his proper right hand on the demon's knee
inscription: On umbrella: 年 {toshi} / こしや {koshiya}
markings: lender\'s tag, on demon\'s proper left leg
signed: On underside of Okame\'s parcel behind his feet: 光仙刻 {Kōsen koku}
title: Netsuke [Okame and Ohi]
